creator: abhijit_kakade@infosys.com
text:
With Apache 2.2.6 and after copuling with resin 3.0.25 (or 3.0.24) with 
mod_caucho configuration in httpd.conf file, apache does not start. Error shown 
is -

httpd.exe: Syntax error on line 115 of C:/Program Files/Apache Software Foundati
on/Apache2.2/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load D:/latest apache resin/resin3.0.25/res
in-3.0.25/win32/apache-2.0/mod_caucho.dll into server: The specified module
could not be found.

It will be ok if you can suggest another lower apache version which is 
compatible with any resin with mod_caucho configuration or a solution to above 
problem in said versions.

Many Thanks

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Nothing to do with the httpd project.  It's documented multiple times over
that 2.0.x modules will not load in 2.2, you need a module compiled for 2.2.
mod_whatever isn't provided by the ASF.
